A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As always Star Wars has brought awe and amazement with locations\, creatures and back story. But I just can't justify Luke being one of the main comic reliefs. It almost made me question if he's actually the chosen one\, since when does the main hero give up and run away? I would have rather seen him strong from start to end. I do appreciate all the other acts or heroism but once again the deaths of main characters should have been more tear jerking scenes.
